response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "medium", "22-year-old males are in a high-crime age range, but not at the peak"),
    ("prior_arrests", "low", "only one prior arrest with no conviction suggests minimal criminal history"),
    ("employment_status", "medium", "having held only one job in the past year may indicate instability"),
    ("education_level", "low", "having a high school diploma is a positive factor, reducing recidivism risk"),
    ("substance_use", "low", "no drug use in the past four years significantly reduces recidivism risk"),
    ("mental_health", "low", "not feeling depressed over the past month is a positive indicator of mental stability"),
    ("family_background", "low", "living with both biological parents at a young age suggests a stable upbringing"),
    ("religious_beliefs", "low", "believing in a higher power can be associated with lower recidivism rates")
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 70
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 22-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs 185 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 5, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
